bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with the growth of parasites in the throat, causing swelling and pain there as a major sign. Shang han zong bing lun 傷寒總病論 3: 黑龍煎，治咽喉腫痛九種疾…急喉閉、纏喉風、結 喉、爛喉、重舌、木舌、遁蟲、蟲喋、飛絲入喉 , “ ‘Black dragon decoction’ cures nine types of ailments of a swollen and aching throat…acute throat closure, throat-constricting wind, bound throat, festering throat, doubled tongue, wooden tongue, run-away bug, worm-gnawing , flying silk threads entering the throat”.
